description: Sets the ammo amount for a weapon item entity (lying on the ground).
*ðŸš© This documentation is for the IW3 version of this function credit to Raid Gaming and has yet to be reviewed/updated for IW4.*

params.name: clip ammo
description: The amount of ammo in the clip.

params.name: stock ammo
description: The amount of ammo in the stockpile.

params.name: alt weapon
description: Pass false to set ammo for the primary weapon. Pass true to set ammo for the alt weapon. Defaults to false.
